-Kw1e7g98y1_PSli51OD.name: Backfire. The effects of the spell are reversed; any harmful effects are applied to you (and the target replaces 'you' in the spell description if applicable) at half the potency. If a beneficial effect is intended to you or an ally, a random target in range is affected.

-Kw1f7Ajnl9vZyQFrtEH.name: Bwaaawk. 2d4 chickens appear within 10 ft. of you.

-Kw1fS8UVCWVo7E3zhBY.name: This isn’t the one I picked! Your nose grows to three times its original size.

-Kw1fpgSYtlkd5NmhgMX.name: Drawing a blank... You are unable to cast this spell for 1d4 rounds.

-Kw1g5ATk78G9f18LYqL.name: Off we go! You teleport 10 ft. in a direction randomly determined by the GM (up is a direction).

-Kw1gQ3Bdr29KdM0Cs1p.name: I’m melting! If this attack deals acid damage: a non-magical item in your pack dissolves.

-Kw1gdty0l1uQtAvucfC.name: Get this thing off me! If this attack deals cold damage: you are uncomfortably hot for 1d4 hours. You do not gain the benefits of being proficient with your armor during this time.

-Kw1gzpwFO4OfhnWa4k6.name: He who smelt it... If this attack deals fire damage: a nauseating stench of sulfur hangs around you for 1d4 days.

-Kw1hTLIGk5N-0Vy_5T6.name: Don’t know my own strength... If this attack deals force damage: for 1d4 days there is a 10% chance when you go to touch or hold something that you extend your hand at full force instead.

-Kw1hrUO7VFUl07Dl5x0.name: Shocking. If this attack deals lightning damage: you suffer an unpleasant shock when you touch metal objects for 1d4 days.

-Kw1iQzdcWIMmtl2f__v.name: Everyone’s favorite party member. If this attack deals necrotic damage: the last enemy you killed rises as a zombie. It is unable to act in any way, but will mindlessly follow you for 1d4 days, after which it will collapse into a corpse again.

-Kw1iohsM-geVaI9mU77.name: Spoiled. If this attack deals poison damage: food eaten by others within 20 ft. of you will be vomited up 2d10 minutes later for 1d4 days.

-Kw1jKG6NCp8xvfPkiNF.name: Night terrors. If this attack deals psychic damage: you must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw when completing the next 1d4 long rests. On a failed save, you are plagued by nightmares and do not receive the benefits of the rest.

-Kw1jfGDTwy2-DDJbqwI.name: Darling, you’re radiant. If this attack deals radiant damage: you emit a bright light for 1d4 hours.

-Kw1jwYii4fUZ-lGsajC.name: LOUD NOISES. If this attack deals thunder damage: your voice is amplified to three times its normal volume for 1d4 hours.

-Kw1kEsaPrX-uovpywak.name: Oh my! A CR 1/4 creature chosen randomly by the GM appears within 30 ft. of you. It is hostile only to you.

-Kw1kgV_KZRgUmhDPIR1.name: My bad! Reroll the attack against an ally within 10 ft. of the target. If the attack hits, it deals 1/2 damage.

-Kw1l1fZ19Ini33BCVmz.name: Hop to it. You cannot walk or run for 1d4 minutes. You can only jump.

-Kw1lNyJKaAV4wwpjbU-.name: Up up and away! You begin to float upwards at a rate of 10 ft. per turn. On each of your turns, make a DC 12 saving throw using your spell casting ability to end this effect and fall from your current height.

-Kw1lmIPCzF4fVyexXWu.name: Oh my! A CR 1/2 creature chosen randomly by the GM appears within 30 ft. of you. It is hostile to everyone.

-Kw1m9BmJuHpvWH3ZDwq.name: Distracting miscast. You are unable to concentrate on spells for 1d4 rounds.

-Kw1mTE0o-gfY_xl6p5-.name: Diminished power. Your spell attack bonus and spell save DC are lowered by 1d4 for 1d4 rounds.

-Kw1mpH1Fu3-ehE5n6uF.name: Got you worked out. The target has advantage on saving throws against your spells for 1d4 rounds.

-Kw1n5jN0fDynfFk3Ndh.name: Freaky... You and the target must each make a DC 12 Charisma saving throw. If both of you fail, your minds are switched for 1d4 rounds.

Not them! Make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you become frightened of creatures of your attacker’s type. Repeat this save each time you face creatures of this type until you have defeated 2d12 of them.
Ragged scar. You receive a permanent scar on your face, and you gain proficiency in Charisma (Intimidation), but lose proficiency in Charisma (Persuasion), if you had it.
Make them pay. Triple damage, and you have advantage on your next attack against the attacker.
Rend armor. Make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, if you’re wearing leather armor: its effectiveness is reduced by 2.
Something slipped. Your AC is reduced by 1d6 for 1d6 rounds.
Wild swing. Any creature within 5 ft. of you and your attacker takes the same damage you took.
Slashed ankles. Triple damage, and you are knocked prone. Make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw when attempting to get back up. On a failed save, you are unable to do so.
Off form. You have disadvantage on melee attacks for 1d6 rounds.
Sweep the legs. Make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, you are knocked prone.
Sliced tendon. Your speed is reduced by 1/2 for 1d6 rounds.
Disarmed. Triple damage, and make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, drop your weapon.
Weakening slash. You deal 1/2 damage on melee attacks for the next 1d6 rounds.
Off form. You have disadvantage on melee attacks for the next 1d6 rounds.
Follow-up. Your attacker may make 1 additional attack against you.

A staff made of pure ice as hard as steel, with two handles wrapped in leather, and a piece of parchment folded into the shape of a diamond (staff of frost, 9th level spell scroll)
A worn cookie tin held shut with a leather strap, filled with 457 pp
A bottle of light-bluish liquid which, if dropped, falls unnaturally slowly to the ground, and a ring cast in the likeness of a curled feather (potion of flying, ring of feather falling)
A shield depicting a dragon in red lacquer, with onyx eyes, and a gout of fiery garnets pouring from its maw (+3 shield)
A simple metal staff decorated with runes along the entire length, and a length of flax rolled and held closed with braided twine (staff of power, 9th level spell scroll)
46 platinum rods with threading at one end and a gem at the other, worth 99 gp each
A scroll of vellum which wiggles near lawful adventurers, and a stone ring set with a tiny, platinum coin (9th level spell scroll, ring of free action)
A beautifully balanced, elegant weapon, whose edges hum softly with faint magic (+3 weapon)
An angular, chromatic staff with a diamond-shaped cross section decorated with faint runes; a large, torn page is loosely wound round the base (staff of striking, 9th level spell scroll)
A set of three rubies set into a broken scabbard, worth 1,528 gp each

A folded note of arcane runes, which, when held, brings back memories best left forgotten, and a silver ring set with an emerald that stills a quivering hand (9th level spell scroll, ring of protection)
A chest containing numerous flasks of blood-red liquid (18 potions of superior healing)

A metal staff decorated with lightning bolts along the shaft and a cluster of lightning bolts extending from the top that crackle and hum with sparks, and a charred sheet of parchment, its ribbon burnt away (staff of thunder and lightning, 9th level spell scroll)
A clockwork bear toy, made of precious metals and jeweled, but missing the key, worth 4,592 gp
A wand capped with a star sapphire arrowhead and fletched base, and a ring bearing the symbol of an anatomical heart (wand of magic missiles, ring of resistance)

A chest containing over a dozen scrolls, some with red tassels, some with silver ribbons, all sealed with gold wax stamped with a taloned foot (nine 4th level spell scrolls, eight 5th level spell scrolls)
An exquisite sword with razor serrations down one side of the blade, and a shield with a glowing, purple opal set into the boss (sword of sharpness, +3 shield)
A bowl made from a skull, silverdipped and tessellated with hexagonal, jet mosaic pieces worth 4,600 gp
A clay flask tied with a tag that reads ‘quaff during dire emergency’, and a ring bearing an unknown glyph (potion of supreme healing, ring of spell storing)

A hoard of weapons, armor, and shields of mixed precious metals, unadorned but crafted with incredible skill (two sets of +1 armor, two quivers/pouches/sacks of +2 ammunition, two +2 shields, four +2 weapons)
A weighty manuscript with a fine leather cover made from white elk skin, and a rusty-red, marble sphere (tome of clear thought, Ioun stone of intellect)
A single yellow diamond, worth 4,600 gp
A crate containing a single weapon of other-worldly crafting and ornamentation, and a gold ring set with a crystal lens (+3 weapon, ring of x-ray vision)
A set of acid-etched armor with a vibrantly green mirror-finish (+2 armor: light, medium, or heavy)
A substantial tome with a gilded cover inlaid with gold-leaf, and a pink and green, marble sphere (tome of leadership and influence, Ioun stone of leadership)
An extravagantly jeweled horse bridle, worth 4,700 gp
A robe embroidered with peering eyes, and a scroll sealed with a wax eye signet (robe of eyes, 8th level warlock spell scroll)
A quiver with a handful of beautifully crafted arrows/bolts whose tips let off a faint gray smoke (five (1d6 + 2) arrows/bolts of slaying)

A sturdy trunk containing a hefty tome with an embossed, red leather cover, and a mismatched heap of various scrolls and scraps of paper (tome of understanding, eight 6th level spell scrolls, six 7th level spell scrolls, two 8th level spell scrolls)
A claim to a gem mine, worth 4,800 gp
A holy writ in scrambled letters, and a shield of crystal and gold banding (8th level cleric spell scroll, +2 shield)
A set of bright, untarnished plate mail with spiked shoulder pieces, clawed gauntlets, and a smoky, gray aura that gives it a malevolent look (demon armor)
A gnarled stick with a living frog encased in a glass orb at the head, and a tattered piece of parchment barely kept rolled with a fraying, grass reed (wand of polymorph, 9th level spell scroll)
A silk shawl hung with teardrop rubies, worth 4,900 gp
A smudged and dirty scroll tied with leather, hung from a staff that stands unsupported on a cluster of roots (8th level druid spell scroll, staff of healing)
A full set of armor made from thick, weathered dragon scales (dragon scale mail)

A delicate, metal wand with series of black opals at the handle and a purple crystal at the tip, around which a piece of parchment is rolled extremely tightly with a black piece of twine (+3 wand of the war mage, 9th level spell scroll)
A masterfully designed gold leaf fan, set with small diamonds, worth 5,000 gp
A scroll of vellum that twitches in the presence of chaotic adventurers, and a sword whose blade is difficult to directly look upon (8th level paladin spell scroll, sun blade)
A beautiful longbow decorated with gold inlay and strange runes that glow with a faint, white light (oathbow)
A chest containing four glass bottles filled with sparkling, pink and red liquid, held snugly in place by satin pillows (4 potions of supreme healing)
A decorative, gold, mail coif, worth 6,000 gp
A sweet-smelling flask of berryflavored wine, and a drooping staff reminiscent of decaying flesh on bones (potion of supreme healing, staff of withering)
A crudely forged sword with a strange blade, a flame-like wave along one side, and serrated on the other (sword of sharpness)
A set of shining, lacquered armor; magical energy glows between each plate (+3 armor: light, medium, or heavy)
A simple statue of a swooning woman in platinum, with two blood-red rubies pock-marking the curve of her neck, worth 7,000 gp
A glass bottle shaped like a hourglass, labeled ‘time heals all wounds’, and a wand of green, patina-covered bronze (potion of supreme healing, wand of lightning bolts)
A thick metal wand with a twisting, elaborately carved handle, and a large yellow crystal set into the tip (+3 wand of the war mage)
A masterfully crafted sword with a large egg-shaped topaz inlaid in the hilt; it glows with a faint orange light when drawn from its sheath (vorpal sword)
Two black sapphires, worth 4,000 gp each
An arrow, around which is rolled and tied a piece of parchment paper with glowing runes, and a wand of black wood, hatch-marked with kills (8th level ranger spell scroll, +2 wand of the war mage)
A sword with a blue blade etched with many strange runes; the hilt runs an uncomfortable chill through the hand and the blade is too cold to touch (frost brand)
A platinum-embossed set of armor with a matching weapon still encased in the attached scabbard (+2 armor, +3 weapon)
An ivory and gold filigree chamber pot, studded with precious stones and gems, worth 9,000 gp
A smoldering scroll that is cold to the touch, and a short, hooded cloak of black feathers (8th level sorcerer spell scroll, wings of flying)
A sword with a smoky-gray blade and a hilt decorated with several carved skulls, each holding a dark red ruby in its mouth (nine lives stealer)
A one-handed weapon engraved with the image of a hunting party, and a matching shield depicting the same group returning with a fresh kill (+3 weapon, +3 shield)
A platinum death-mask inlaid with jewels and etched with gold, worth 10,000 gp
An evil looking parchment of black and red, issuing whispers of doom, and a fantastical, golden, clockwork wand, studded with multi-colored gems (8th level warlock spell scroll, wand of wonder)
A wonderfully light scimitar with a very thin, whippy blade, and a pommel made from a large yellow diamond (scimitar of speed)
Two identical weapons as if made as a matching set, each with three manyhued opals set into their handles (two +3 weapons)
